author: James Martin
method: Cut 3 slashes in each fillet and place in a shallow dish  Stir the paprika and salt into the butter and rub well into the flesh making sure it gets into the slits. Leave to infuse for 15-20 minutes Place under a hot grill or on the BBQ until just cooked. Serve with wedges of lime.
ingredients: 8 mackerel fillets,  85g/3oz butter, softened or melted,  1 heaped tbsp hot smoked paprika ,  sea salt,  2 limes, cut into wedges
